description: Ben Snell is a software developer and interaction designer specialized in creative applications of emerging technologies, including computer vision, machine learning and robotics. Ben is currently a Creative Technologist at Local Projects. Before this, he was an Innovator in Residence at Autodesk's Pier 9 fabrication research center. He graduated from Carnegie Mellon University in 2017 with University Honors after defining his own major, Experiential Art and Design. He lives and works in New York City. For work experience, see LinkedIn. For code samples, see Github. Resume available here. . . . Website designed + programmed from scratch.
